item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, May 8, 2025 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Void: Open-source Cursor alternative (230 points | 127 comments)
2. From: Steve Jobs. "Great idea, thank you." (60 points | 7 comments)
3. Reservoir Sampling (96 points | 19 comments)

8. First American pope elected and will be known as Pope Leo XIV (222 points | 350 comments)

10. Ciro (YC S22) is hiring a software engineer to build AI agents for sales ( | hide)

13. Ask HN: What are good high-information density UIs (screenshots, apps, sites)? (280 points | 218 comments)
14. Mycoria is an open and secure overlay network that connects all participants (297 points | 111 comments)
15. How to harden GitHub Actions (170 points | 55 comments)

23. AI focused on brain regions recreates what you're looking at (2024) (22 points | 14 comments)

25. Will protein design tools solve the snake antivenom shortage? (48 points | 18 comments)
26. Mass spectrometry method identifies pathogens within minutes instead of days (119 points | 40 comments)
27. Brokk: AI for Large Codebases (29 points | 7 comments)
28. More people are getting tattoos removed (60 points | 89 comments)
29. Heat stress mitigation by trees and shelters at bus stops (128 points | 103 comments)
30. Microservices are a tax your startup probably can't afford (235 points | 197 comments)
